title: qr attendence system
description: Led a team of 4 to develop a scalable web app with networked QR code attendance, submission windows, and secure data using Python, Django, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Blood Bank Inventory Management System through DBMS.
description: Created a Blood Bank Inventory Management System with Django and SQL Server, implementing user registration, donation tracking, and stock management through a user-friendly interface.

title: Creating a Dynamic Cityscape and celestial bodies Simulation.
description: Developed a dynamic cityscape simulation with a day-night cycle using Python and PyOpenGL, featuring randomized elements and cross-platform compatibility.

title: AI-Powered Sentiment Insight API Tool
description: Built a Flask-based API to process customer reviews in CSV and XLSX formats, integrated Groq API for AI-powered sentiment analysis, and implemented features for real-time insights, ensuring reliable performance and accurate analysis.
